hero.title: Software Developer Specializing in Web and Backend Architectures
hero.subtitle: I build optimized, secure, and scalable applications using modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am Wilfredo Paiz, a computer engineer passionate about web and mobile development. I have 6 years of experience in software development, specializing in creating APIs and UIs using various frameworks. Additionally, I have solid knowledge in production deployments with Docker and Kubernetes.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I have worked in companies from fintech, e-learning, SaaS, and digital agency sectors, participating in key projects that have impacted hundreds of users.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.allProjectsDescription: A collection of my work spanning web applications, mobile development, and more. Each project represents a unique challenge and solution.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below.
